MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00am to make a permanent repair to a faulty section of underground cable in Gilloch Crescent and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of on site difficulties when excavating and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.17pm on the 3rd of December 2020.
